name: XMLTechGeek's Home
tagline: Caving and Coding go oh so well together
body:
### Who Are You?
XMLTechGeek, also know as Paul Ryan.

Twitter: @xmltechgeek

LinkedIn: http://www.linkedin.com/in/paullryan/

Blog: http://xmltechgeek.blogspot.com/

### Where Do You Live?
Colorado, Between Boulder and Denver

### What Do You Do with Software?
Build software teams, build software, solve business problems

### What Else Do You Do?

## Caving
I've been a caver for a number of years and have gotten pretty heavily involved with caving organizations in colorado.
* I'm the vice-chair of the Colorado Grotto http://www.coloradogrotto.org
* I'm the webmaster of the Front Range Grotto http://www.frontrangegrotto.org
* I'm on the board of directors for the williams canyon project http://www.williamscanyon.org

## Running
Just an amateur jogger, that's all there is to tell.

## Traveling
My wife is a photographer (http://www.diamondphotogallery.com) so we love to travel and find new things to photograph and explore.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
